CustomField.description:
If the subscription type is "kWh", it retrieves the 'Size Ratio' from the related sizing method.
If the subscription type is "Electricity Cost ($)", it retrieves the 'Value of Net Metering Credit' from the related sizing method.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(Sizing_Method__c), null, IF(ISBLANK(Subscription_Type__c), null, IF(Subscription_Type__c = "kWh", Sizing_Method__r.Size_Ratio__c, IF(Subscription_Type__c = "Electricity Cost ($)", Sizing_Method__r.Value_of_Net_Metering_Credit__c, null))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If the subscription type is "kWh", it retrieves the 'Size Ratio' from the related sizing method.
If the subscription type is "Electricity Cost ($)", it retrieves the 'Value of Net Metering Credit' from the related sizing method.
CustomField.label: Sizing Ratio
